notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected waters and probable flood waters in the Chennai area of the Tamil Nadu State in India. Using satellite imagery acquired 24 November 2015, 12 November 2015, 14 October 2015 and 01 September 2015. UNITAR-UNOSAT identified expansion of waters in the area of Chennai. Standing waters extended between the 24 November 2015 and 12 November 2015 and the total water expansion is estimated to be about 10% between the two dates. This analysis has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR-UNOSAT.
